hotels.title: South Africa Wine Estate in Franschhoek with Onsite Dining & Wellness Spa
hotels.description: With a highly acclaimed culinary and wellness reputation and verdant vineyard setting, Leeu Estates has all the ingredients for a sensational South African adventure. A connoisseur's delight, the estate hosts a world-class wine-tasting studio, the award-winning La Petite Colombe restaurant and the exclusive The Dining Room, where resplendent views of the valley await. Immerse yourself at Leeu Spa by Healing Earth, where treatments are inspired by Africa's natural resources.
